login.title: Login Page
login.form.title: Log in
login.form.emailAddressError: Email must be a valid email address
login.form.passwordError: Password should have at least {minLengthPassword} characters, at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and a special character
login.form.accountLocked: Your account has been locked or disabled. Please contact support to resolve this, then try again.
login.form.invalidLogin: The user id and password you entered is invalid.
login.form.password.visible.ariaLabel: Password is visible, press to hide
login.form.password.hidden.ariaLabel: Password is hidden, press to show
resetPassword.form.title: Reset password
resetPassword.form.passwordError: Password should have at least {minLengthPassword} characters, at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and a special character
sessionExpiration.title: Session expired
sessionExpiration.message: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
